name: dauntlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows determination and no fear: She carried on dauntlessly, and paid no attention to her critics. The lawyer was small and dauntlessly persistent, questioning the witnesses aggressively.
More examplesFewer examplesShe dauntlessly faced their attackers.A huge range of rhythms and styles make up this dauntlessly energetic history of dance.He dauntlessly led a charge, driving the enemy back and preventing a breakthrough in our lines.A number of the dauntlessly brave, as well as the reckless and stupid, died in the battle.
